title: Castillo de San Marcos National Monument: Field Trips
body: Field Trips      Welcome! The Castillo de San Marcos is a very popular destination for school field trips.  In fact, approximately ten percent of our total visitation, or sixty thousand people, visit the Castillo every year as part of a school visit. We are sorry but we are unable to provide Ranger-led educational tours. Schools which perform a self-guided field trip are eligible for and may request a waiver of the admission fees. If you tour the Castillo de San Marcos NM with a Commercial Tour Guide you do not qualify for an Educational Fee Waiver.  For an Academic Fee Waiver form please call 904-829-6506, x239.   While your group is visiting the Castillo de San Marcos NM, we ask that you follow these rules. Click here.  If you have any questions or are planning to visit with a large group, please call 904-829-6506, x239 for more information or email us.
